original_text: And thou shalt observe the feast of weeks, of the firstfruits of wheat harvest, and the feast of ingathering at the year's end.
korean_text: 칠칠절 곧 맥추의 초실절을 지키고 세말에는 수장절을 지키라

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt observe the feast of weeks
of the firstfruits of wheat harvest
and the feast of ingathering at the year's end
